verses.name: 1 Chronicles 28:2
verses.text: Then David the king stood up upon his feet, and said, Hear me, my brethren, and my people: As for me, I had in mine heart to build an house of rest for the ark of the covenant of the Lord, and for the footstool of our God, and had made ready for the building:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 28:3
verses.text: But God said unto me, Thou shalt not build an house for my name, because thou hast been a man of war, and hast shed blood.
